DOC.criteria: Healthy male volunteer Able willing comply requirement study , confirm write informed consent Aged 20 26 year Within acceptable range weight body mass index ( 7085 kg 21 25 kg/m2 ) At least 1214 year formal education In good general health determine medical history screening investigation ( see ) Taking regular medication No history psychiatric disorder Moderate alcohol consumption ( le 190.4 g/week ) accord Daily Drink questionnaire ( Collins et a. , 1985 ) `` sporadic '' user Energy Drinks ( few 10 can 250 ml last 6 month ) Confirmation general practitioner/primary care physician know reason would prevent participation Similar social demographic data , similar quality life similar pattern use alcoholic beverage Energy Drinks well quality life ( Martinez et al. , 2000 ) similar level physical activity ( physical activity questionnaire ) ( Baecke et al. , 1982 ) Any condition investigator and/or sponsor consider might increase risk volunteer decrease chance obtain satisfactory data Consumed 2 > x > 4 caffeinecontaining drinks/day within 3 month screen Smoked > 10 cigarettes/day equivalent within 3 month screen Consumed 190.4 g alcohol per week , history alcohol drug abuse Consumed le one alcoholic drink per week
